experience: You and Alex both know John Furrier, Steven Roberts, and 140 others
Alex can introduce you to 20 people at General Motors
Phoenix/ Tempe Area: Offering $500 for any referral that gets hired.
Corporate Recruiter (internal): $50-70k - Experience recruiting in the Sales and Marketing industry. Call Center Environment is a big plus.
Inside Sales Manager: $50-70k - Must be familiar with KPI. Call Center experience required (outbound preferred).
Any internal or corporate recruiters looking for a new opportunity? 50-70k salary range. If you know any please tag them below or send me a direct message!

I am looking for an IT Manager interested in playing a pivotal role in a new start up. Location is in Scottsdale. Salary range is 100-125k. If you know someone who may be interested feel free to direct message me!

TopLine Strategies is an award-winning, market-leading application integrator in the Southwest. We help our clients better integrate CRM, Marketing and Customer Service technologies, Mobile Apps, Content Management and BI solutions. Our team believes strongly that effective alignment of revenue-related technologies empowers sales and marketing professionals to achieve higher productivity, more targeted sales and faster closing rates. Our objective is to allow teams to share intelligence across devices, channels, locations, departments and time, from first marketing impression to closed-won opportunity to drive breakthrough results. Being an award winning application integrator allows us to have the resources that other staffing agencies can’t. We have our engineers screen candidates before submitting them to our clients. The idea behind this is to save you time and resources by sending you quality candidates. Responsible for IT recruiting department tasks from top to bottom.Courted and placed reputable, award winning talent in the IT industryResponsible for creating job descriptions for a range of IT opportunitiesResponsible for contract negotiations with both vendors and candidatesResponsible for seeking new client opportunities/job ordersResponsible for determining candidate market value Responsible for full life cycle from obtaining client/job order, finding candidate, to contract negotiations and placementSalary package negotiationsImplemented multiple CRM list views in order to enhance user friendliness and navigation. Interview preparation expertWorks and reports directly to CEO on a daily basisWorks directly with the marketing department on campaigns, and candidate visibility. Works directly with sales department to determine up-sell/cross-sell opportunitiesLead small team to 600k in revenue 2015. Billed 300k in revenue 2015

Advanced to an elite sales department position within 3 months. Advised customers as a small business expert through outbound phone consultations for required 82% of my day. Assessed customer needs and developed web based solutions to allow the customer to grow in their business and marketing plans. Established and maintained client supportive relationship increasing company revenue of both.
Inbound Technical Sales and Support specialist

Instrumental in helping customers establish and enhance their online presence by providing customer service, product information and web-based technical support. Thrived in a sales driven, customer focused environment ranking #18 among top performers in the company and #7 in new revenue overall sales out of 1,000 employees, earning endorsement for promotion. Advisor for web site problems, reaching satisfactory resolution, selling product and increasing profits.

B2B- Trusted to contact businesses on behalf of respected news stations (FOX, ABC, CBS) for online local news ads. Searched and qualified businesses that needed marketing assistance. Proactively generated revenue by constructing marketing solutions. Conveyed the value of online advertising to realtors, lawyers, brokers, and investors. Conducted cold calling campaigns (met 82 dials quota) as well as organized strategies in order for companies to reach exposure in their market.

Superseded B2C outside sales rep quotas. Promoted from Entry Level Sales to Corporate Trainer. Responsible for interviewing, training, and mentoring entry levels. Experience in public speaking, personal development, time management, running small meetings.

Technical troubleshooting in the event of equipment malfunction in university classrooms. Skilled and reliable at coordination of maintenance, repair and instruction for hardware and software asrequired. Created excellent client service experience for both faculty and students.

Lead research, evaluation and development in order to improve efficiency for small solar energy company. Including; constructing a full in depth safety manual to ensure OSHA regulations were followed. Managed and wrote corporate communications, such as newsletters, articles and social media. Lead and managed sales team to quarter revenue of $300,000 and 25% profit.

recommendations: February 26, 2015, Bobby was a client of Alex’s

It's rare to find in this day and age someone who is professional, helpful and knowledgeable but also truly cares about you. This is exactly who Alex is! I've recently had the privilege of working with Alex. He recruited me through linkedin and proceeded to walk me through various interviews and processes in pursuing this new position. He was entirely professional guiding me and assisting me through their processes, while keeping me informed and up to date on what he knew. Through all this it was obvious that he also really did care if I did or didn't get the position. He was always thinking of how to help me out and give me an edge. He was helpful, knowledgeable, professional, personable and caring. It was not only my pleasure to have met Alex but it was an honor to work with him. I'd highly recommend him along with TopLine Strategies.

February 25, 2015, Alex worked with Bobby in different groups

It is not often you get the pleasure of working with someone as much as I did with Bobby. Bobby is one of the best candidates I have worked with in a long time. His feedback was almost always immediate. He is detail oriented and well organized. Not only can he find many people willing to attest to his technical experience but his character as well, which I think is more important. Throughout the process of working with Bobby he always went the extra mile when asked and didn't even question it. Overall, he is an outstanding professional who is the epitome of integrity in every sense of the word.

February 3, 2015, Robert was a client of Alex’s

I had the opportunity to work with Robert through a job transition. He is a pleasant person to work with. His technical abilities are clearly excellent. However I believe his biggest asset is his personality. He is extremely courteous and professional. He also is a great listener and very understanding. I believe he will be an asset to any company that is lucky enough to have him.
